MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML10 postcode area of Strathaven. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6pm. Our engineers have arrived at Redding Houses substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.01pm on Thursday 31 December 2020.
